skills.description: If this holomem has at least 3 Cheers attached, this Art gains +30 power.

name: Otonose Kanade
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Otonose Kanade
bloomEffect: „Åì„Åì„ÅåÁßÅ„ÅÆ„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Ç∏„Å†„Åã„ÇâÔºÅ:„ÄÄYou may move any 1-2 Cheers on your Stage to this holomem.

name: Otonose Kanade
giftEffect: „Å™„Çì„Å°„ÇÖ„Éº„Åì„Å£„Åü: At the end of your opponent's Performance Step, if you lost any LIFE during that Performance Step, you may send 1 Cheer from your Archive to this holomem.
extraEffect: When this Holomen is downed, your life is reduced by 2

name: Gorgeous PC
ability: To play this card, you must Archive one holo power. Reveal a 1st Bloom holomem that is the same color as your Oshi holomem from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

name: Super PC
ability: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Reveal up to 1 Debut holomem and up to 1 1st Bloom holomem from among them and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Dual Monitor PC
ability: Reveal 1-2 Debut holomems with the Extra text „ÄåYou may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck„Äç from your Deck and put them on your Stage. Then shuffle your Deck.

name: Call and Response
ability: Move 1 Cheer from one of your holomems to another.

name: Call-In
ability: This card can only be played if you have less LIFE than your opponent. If your opponent has no Collab holomem, they choose one of their Back holomems and move it to the Collab Position (this is not treated as Collabing).

name: Fan Meeting
ability: Reveal 1 Fan from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

name: Can you do the Hololive?
ability: Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are Debut holomems and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: hololive ID 1st Gen
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #IDGen1 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: hololive 0th Generation
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Gen0 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: hololive 4th Gen
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Gen4 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: FPS stream
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Shooter and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: holocap
ability: If this is attached to a Debut or Spot holomem, it gains the following effects:  The holomem with this Tool attached has +30 HP. The holomem with this Tool attached does not take special damage from your opponent. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

name: Rifle
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later holomem with #Shooter, it gains the following effect: special damage done by this holomem to a single opposing holomem is increased by +10. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

name: Recorder
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later <Otonose Kanade>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Tool attached Downs one of your opponent's holomems, draw 1 card from your Deck. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

name: Kintoki
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Sakura Miko>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, draw 1 card from your Deck. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem..

name: Maguchi
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to <Sakura Miko>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, if your Center holomem is Sakura Miko that holomem's Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Pero
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Fuwawa Abyssgard> or <Mococo Abyssgard>, it gains the following effect: the Cheer requirements of all Arts of the holomem this is attached to become Colorless. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Bibi
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Tokoyami Towa>, it gains the following effect: special damage done by this holomem to a single opposing holomem is increased by +10. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Futoinu
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.If this is attached to <Inugami Korone>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, you may send 1 Yellow Cheer from your Archive to that holomem.You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Hosoinu
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to <Inugami Korone>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached is Downed, you may Archive one holo power to return this Mascot to your hand.You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Riscot
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.If this is attached to <Ayunda Risu>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached Collabs, you may move 1 Cheer from any of your holomems to that holomem. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Luknight
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is about to take damage, you may Archive this Fan to reduce that damage by 30. This Fan may only be attached to your Himemori Luna, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: SSRB
ability: When the holomem with this Mascot attached Archives Cheer as part of their Ability or Arts, you may Archive this Fan instead of one Cheer. This Fan may only be attached to your Shishiro Botan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: 35P
ability: When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Red Cheer.When the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, your opponent may draw 1 card from their Deck.This Fan may only be attached to your Sakura Miko, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Haaton
ability: When you roll dice as part of the Abilities or Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached, you may Archive this Fan for the following effect: re-roll all dice rolled as part of this ability. This Fan may only be attached to your Akai Haato, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Ruffians
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may send 1 Blue Cheer from your Archive to one of your holomems named Fuwawa Abyssgard. This Fan may only be attached to your Fuwawa Abyssgard or Mococo Abyssgard, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Roboser
ability: When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Purple Cheer.The Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached lose -10 power.This Fan may only be attached to your Robocosan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Koronesuki
ability: The Baton Pass Cheer cost of the holomem this is attached to is reduced by 1.This Fan may only be attached to your Inugami Korone, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem..

name: Watamate
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may move 1-2 Yellow Cheers from that holomem to another of your holomems named Tsunomaki Watame. This Fan may only be attached to your Tsunomaki Watame, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Risuners
ability: (Once per turn) When the holomem with this Fan attached received Cheer, their Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn. This Fan may only be attached to your Ayunda Risu, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
